Metadata: The Sea Grant Association (SGA) Newsletter (Volume VII, Number 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, January-​July/August 1977)

Issues of this newsletter contain highlights of the Sea Grant Association activities for the year including: the Washington Report, the Executive Committee, Committees of the Association, Senate Congressional Records, NOAA Department of Commerce Appropriation and budget, National Science Foundation reports, Presidential information, and Sea Grant Association Articles of Organization and other miscellaneous important information and Washington news to share with the Sea Grant Program.
